gcc  -pthread -g   CMakeFiles/rewrite.dir/main.c.o CMakeFiles/rewrite.dir/srcs/process_input.c.o CMakeFiles/rewrite.dir/srcs/initialise_philos.c.o CMakeFiles/rewrite.dir/srcs/clean_up.c.o CMakeFiles/rewrite.dir/srcs/start_action.c.o CMakeFiles/rewrite.dir/srcs/check_status.c.o CMakeFiles/rewrite.dir/srcs/time_calculation.c.o CMakeFiles/rewrite.dir/srcs/print.c.o CMakeFiles/rewrite.dir/srcs/support_functions.c.o  -o rewrite
